refresher.title: Why React Router?
refresher.content:
# React Router v6

## Problem

Single Page Apps need client-side routing ‚Äî changing URL without full page reload.

## React Router v6 Features

- `<BrowserRouter>`
- `<Routes>` and `<Route>`
- `<Link>` and `<NavLink>`
- `useParams`, `useNavigate`
- Nested routes

**Let's build a multi-page dashboard! ‚Üí**

negative.description: This link causes full page reload. Why?
negative.question: Why does this cause a full reload?

options.explanation: ‚úÖ Correct! Regular <a> reloads the page. <Link> enables client-side routing.

negative.lesson: **Always use <Link> or <NavLink> instead of <a> for internal navigation.**
